message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I can see you're a serious buyer, and I appreciate your offer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit off. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal! However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $125. I'm willing to go up to $135, but that's my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
I'm willing to meet you halfway between $135 and $128. How about $131.50? It's my best and final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $129?

I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, but I'm still willing to meet you at $130. That's my absolute final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're getting tired of going back and forth, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. I'm willing to meet you at $129.50. That's my final offer.
